titlePart.text: WORKING OF SUBSTANCES IN A PLASTIC STATE, IN GENERAL
WORKING OF SUBSTANCES NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR
titlePart.entryReference: see Section C, particularly , for chemical matters
shaping clay or other ceramic compositions, slag, or mixtures containing cementitious material

noteParagraph.text: For the purpose of this class, "plastics" means macromolecular compounds or compositions based thereon.
A product is not classified here unless it results from a process which is itself classified in this class.

titlePart.text: PREPARATION OR PRETREATMENT OF THE MATERIAL TO BE SHAPED
SHAPING OR JOINING OF SUBSTANCES IN A PLASTIC STATE, IN GENERAL

titlePart.entryReference: processes or apparatus predominantly used for thermoplastic substances

titlePart.text: PROCESSES OR APPARATUS FOR PRODUCING PARTICULAR ARTICLES FROM PLASTICS OR FROM SUBSTANCES IN A PLASTIC STATE
titlePart.entryReference: specially adapted for working of natural or synthetic rubbers

titlePart.text: PROCESSES OR APPARATUS PREDOMINANTLY USED FOR SHAPING OF THERMOPLASTIC SUBSTANCES
titlePart.entryReference: shaping of plastics in general, casting plastics in an open mould, joining plastics

noteParagraph.text: This sub-class includes the working of thermosetting substances by the same processes or apparatus.

titlePart.text: PROCESSES FOR APPARATUS PREDOMINANTLY USED FOR THE SHAPING OF THERMOSETTING SUBSTANCES
titlePart.entryReference: working of thermosetting substances by processes or apparatus also applicable to thermoplastic substances

titlePart.text: PROCESSES OR APPARATUS SPECIALLY ADAPTED FOR WORKING OF NATURAL OR SYNTHETIC RUBBERS
titlePart.entryReference: working of rubber in the same manner as plastics, see the relevant sub-classes for plastics

titlePart.text: SHAPING OR WORKING OF MATERIALS, NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR
MOULDING BOARDS OR ARTICLES FROM WOOD PARTICLES

noteParagraph.text: This sub-class applies only if the main constituent of the material is not covered by any other sub-class.
